turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order for Starbucks espresso beverages, the one on Hillside Avenue in Harrisonburg.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a freshly brewed coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like a I want a a cold-brew coffee with milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of milk do you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a grande with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you want a grande cold brew with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande cold brew with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't believe so, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, have a nice day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
